title: Subgoal Labeling Instructional Design for Analyzing Domain-Specific Problem-Solving Performance Differences

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental concepts in scientific statistics/chemistry and problem-solving experience
context.additional_context: Centered on smartphone-based learning activities, including analysis and application of real-world scientific problem-solving cases

learning_goals: Learners can decompose statistical/chemical problem-solving procedures step-by-step using subgoal labeling techniques
Learners can compare and explain differences in problem-solving approaches based on domain characteristics
Learners can produce project outcomes using smartphone apps in a limited technological environment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
